Package model.portfolio

Interface IPortfolio

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PortfolioImpl
    public interface IPortfolio
    Represents a stock portfolio and holds all the functions relating to a portfolio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addToPortfolio​(Stock inputStock)
      A method to add a new stock to our portfolio.
      java.lang.String formatStock()
      Formats all the stock within this portfolio, including their ticker symbol and the number of shares the portfolio has.
      java.lang.String getPortfolioTitle()
      Returns the title of the portfolio, and is used for formatting, and equivalency checks.
      java.lang.String getPortfolioValue​(java.time.LocalDate givenDate)
      A method to get the current info in the portfolio.
      Stock getStock​(java.lang.String ticker)
      Finds the stock within this portfolio with the given ticker symbol.
      void removeFromPortfolio​(java.lang.String removeStock)
      A method to remove a stock from our portfolio.

    • Method Detail

      • getPortfolioTitle

        java.lang.String getPortfolioTitle()
        Returns the title of the portfolio, and is used for formatting, and equivalency checks.
        Returns:
        The title of the portfolio.

      • getStock

        Stock getStock​(java.lang.String ticker)
        Finds the stock within this portfolio with the given ticker symbol.
        Parameters:
        ticker - The ticker symbol for the desired stock.
        Returns:
        The stock with the given ticker symbol.

      • formatStock

        java.lang.String formatStock()
        Formats all the stock within this portfolio, including their ticker symbol and the number of shares the portfolio has.
        Returns:
        The formatted stocks as a String.

      • getPortfolioValue

        java.lang.String getPortfolioValue​(java.time.LocalDate givenDate)
        A method to get the current info in the portfolio.
        Returns:
        Returns the current data in the portfolio as a structured String.

      • addToPortfolio

        void addToPortfolio​(Stock inputStock)
        A method to add a new stock to our portfolio.
        Parameters:
        inputStock - The stock we wish to add to our portfolio.

      • removeFromPortfolio

        void removeFromPortfolio​(java.lang.String removeStock)
        A method to remove a stock from our portfolio.
        Parameters:
        removeStock - The stock we wish to remove from our portfolio.
